title: Explore
summary: [Character 1], [Character 2], [Character 3], and [Character 4] venture deeper into the dungeon.

title: Confront
summary: [Character 1], [Character 2], [Character 3], and [Character 4] encounter [Enemies] and prepare for battle. The characters react to the foe(s), discuss strategy, steel themselves, or cower in fear.

title: Ambushed
summary: [Character 1], [Character 2], [Character 3], and [Character 4] are suddenly attacked by [Enemies], scrambling to their feet and grabbing their weapons.

title: Outmaneuver
summary: [Character 1], [Character 2], [Character 3], and [Character 4] set up a clever ambush against [Enemies]. They execute their plan, hoping to gain the upper hand in the ensuing battle.

title: Struggle
summary: [Character 1], [Character 2], [Character 3], and [Character 4] are locked in fierce combat with [Enemies]. The battle rages on as both sides fight for supremacy, with the outcome hanging in the balance.

title: Vanquish
summary: [Character 1], [Character 2], [Character 3], and [Character 4] have defeated [Enemies]. They catch their breath, tend to their wounds, and search for spoils of victory while reflecting on the hard-fought battle.

title: Respite
summary: [Character 1], [Character 2], [Character 3], and [Character 4] set up camp in a relatively safe area of the dungeon. They rest, recover, and prepare for the challenges that lie ahead.
